messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
Gotta' go find Cybil!{~N}No time to go back.{~E}
{~J1(4.3)}But you know, Cheryl isn't{~N}my biological daughter.
{~J1(3.9)}We found her abandoned{~N}on the side of the highway.
{~J1(3.3)}We didn't have any kids{~N}of our own.
{~J1(3.4)}and it didn't look like{~N}she was getting any better.
{~J1(5.2)}There might be some connection{~N}between Cheryl and this town.{~E}
{~J1(3.5)}Cheryl is my daughter.{~N}I will save her.
{~J0(6.0)}What in the hell...{~N}How could this have happened?{~E}
{~J1(4.0)}I don't know who you are,{~N}what you are trying to do,{~N}and I don't care.
{~J1(4.0)}This is the end of{~N}your little game.
{~J1(4.6)}You've been a ghastly little pest,{~N}haven't you?  Alessa?
{~J1(4.5)}But Mommy didn't know{~N}how much you'd grown.
{~J1(4.3)}That's why I couldn't catch you{~N}all by myself.
{~J1(5.0)}Now you're half indebted{~N}to this man for his help.
{~J1(6.9)}Alessa. My dear little girl...{~N}There is one thing left{~N}I need you to do for me.{~E}
